text:
National Electricity (Tasmania) Law

The National Electricity Law, as in force from time to time, set out in the Schedule to the National Electricity (South Australia) Act 1996 of South Australia is applied (with modifications) as a law of Tasmania by the Electricity - National Scheme (Tasmania) Act 1999 and, as so applying, may be referred to as the National Electricity (Tasmania) Law

1. Commencement
    The provisions of the National Electricity Law were applied as a law of Tasmania on 29 May 2005.

2. Further information
    The full text of the National Electricity Law is set out in the Schedule to the National Electricity (South Australia) Act 1996 of South Australia (click on INFORMATION for a link to South Australian legislation). See the Electricity - National Scheme (Tasmania) Act 1999 for modifications to the National Electricity Law as it applies in Tasmania.
